page.title: 15Sutton Village Halls.
page.content: The Parish Council is responsible for administering the village hall.Mr.W.Rushby is responsible for the care of the hall.The hall is a wooden construction built by a local industry,Waltons & Co. Ltd.,established in the area over 100 years ago. Social events are held there egs. bingo;Women's Institute;May Day celebrations;Cubs and private functions.The Parish Council charges for the use of the hall. The school hall may also be hired for village use from The Area Education Office,Newark.It is used for Parish Council meetings,Evening Institute classes,Parent-Teacher meetings and social events. Both halls are centres for village social life.
